item.title: About
item.description: YosysHQ Blog site. For more information about YosysHQ, see our website.

item.title: Yosys User's Group
item.description: We have recently started a Yosys User’s Group. You can see the minutes of our first 5 calls here. If you’d like to join, then please sign up to the newsletter or follow us on: linkedin, mastodon or twitter. YUG 5 - SystemVerilog with Pulp’s SVase An introduction to Bender, Morty and SVase YUG 4 - all the plugins! List of all the plugins we know of Gabriel Gouvine talks about how he wrote a logic locking plugin Martin Povišer talks about the Python plugin API YUG 3 - pick your primitives!
